评论概述: Side Pockets Create A Lumpy Sillouette
评论详情: This is a beautiful dress: nicely weighted fabric, smoothing wrap torso, and perfect sleeve length.  What ruined it was the lumpy pockets right at the hip!  If you're a seamstress, just sew down the side seam and cut the pockets right out...  easy.  I don't have time for it, so it had to go back.  I would absolutely keep this flattering dress if the pockets were gone.

This is a beautiful dress! The material is a nice weight and not thin. I have the dreaded mom tummy and this dress is so flattering. I’m 5 feet 125 pounds. A 34 E bra size. This dress fit perfectly!  I’ve ordered two more in different colors. I did have to wear heels because of my height but it didn’t drag the floor. The colors are vibrant. There was no smell to it which was great. The pockets were an added bonus. Who doesn’t want pockets in a dress. I have an aunt with very different portions that orders one and it also looks great on her. She’s 5’4”, 170lbs with 40DD bra size and 40 inch hips. You’ll love this dress so go ahead and order one!
